title: Interplay between topological and thermodynamic stability in a metastable magnetic skyrmion lattice

title: Entangling atomic spins with a Rydberg-dressed spin-flip blockade
title_cn: 用Rydberg修饰的自旋翻转封锁器缠结原子自旋
abstract: Controlling the quantum entanglement between parts of a many-body system is key to unlocking the power of quantum technologies such as quantum computation, high-precision sensing, and the simulation of many-body physics. The spin degrees of freedom of ultracold neutral atoms in their ground electronic state provide a natural platform for such applications thanks to their long coherence times and the ability to control them with magneto-optical fields. However, the creation of strong coherent coupling between spins has been challenging. Here we demonstrate a strong and tunable Rydberg-dressed interaction between spins of individually trapped caesium atoms with energy shifts of order 1 MHz in units of Planck’s constant. This interaction leads to a ground-state spin-flip blockade, whereby simultaneous hyperfine spin flips of two atoms are inhibited owing to their mutual interaction. We employ this spin-flip blockade to rapidly produce single-step Bell-state entanglement between two atoms with a fidelity ≥81(2)%.
abstract_cn: 控制多体系统各部分之间的量子纠缠是释放量子技术（如量子计算，高精度感测和多体物理模拟）功能的关键。处于基态电子态的超冷中性原子的自旋自由度由于其长相干时间长且具有利用磁光场控制它们的能力而为此类应用提供了自然的平台。但是，在自旋之间建立强大的相干耦合一直具有挑战性。在这里，我们证明了单个俘获的铯原子的自旋之间具有强大且可调的里德堡式相互作用，其能量位移约为1 MHz，单位为普朗克常数。这种相互作用导致了基态自旋翻转封锁，从而由于两个原子的相互相互作用而抑制了同时发生的两个原子的超精细自旋翻转。我们利用这种自旋翻转封锁功能，以保真度为＆＃8805; 81（2）％快速在两个原子之间产生单步贝尔状态纠缠。

title: Raman coherence in a circuit quantum electrodynamics lambda system
title_cn: 电路量子电动力学Lambda系统中的拉曼相干
abstract: Atomic three-level Λ systems dressed by two coherent electromagnetic fields can exhibit coherent population trapping and electromagnetically induced transparency (EIT) due to quantum interference. By addressing the combined qubit–cavity states of a superconducting transmon qubit in a three-dimensional copper cavity with two microwave drives we establish an effective Λ system, two legs of which are defined by a dipole transition and a two-photon transition. This circuit-based system allows the observation of three-microwave-photon Raman coherence effects, including coherent population trapping and EIT, which are demonstrated here with both steady-state spectroscopic techniques and time-domain measurements. By sending Gaussian microwave pulses through the cavity in the EIT regime, a negative group velocity of the pulse is observed with the peak of the pulse exiting the cavity 9.4 μs before entering.
abstract_cn: 原子三级＆＃923; 具有两个相干电磁场的系统可能由于量子干扰而表现出相干的陷阱和电磁感应的透明性（EIT）。 通过用两个微波驱动器解决三维铜腔中超导跨子量子比特的组合量子比特腔态，我们建立了有效的量子比特。 该系统的两个分支由偶极跃迁和双光子跃迁定义。 这个基于电路的系统允许观察三微波光子拉曼相干效应，包括相干人口陷阱和EIT，这在稳态光谱技术和时域测量中都得到了证明。 通过以EIT方式将高斯微波脉冲发送通过空腔，可以观察到脉冲的负群速度，其中脉冲的峰值在进入空腔之前9.4 s离开空腔。

title: Microscopic theory and quantum simulation of atomic heat transport
title_cn: 原子传热的微观理论和量子模拟
abstract: Quantum simulation methods based on electronic-structure theory are deemed unfit to cope with atomic heat transport within the Green–Kubo formalism, because quantum-mechanical energy densities and currents are inherently ill-defined at the atomic scale. We show that, although this difficulty would also affect classical simulations, thermal conductivity is indeed insensitive to such ill-definedness by virtue of a kind of gauge invariance resulting from energy extensivity and conservation. On the basis of these findings, we derive an expression for the adiabatic energy flux from density-functional theory, which allows heat transport to be simulated using ab initio equilibrium molecular dynamics. Our methodology is demonstrated by comparing its predictions to those of classical equilibrium and ab initio non-equilibrium (Müller–Plathe) simulations for a liquid-argon model, and by applying it to heavy water at ambient conditions.
abstract_cn: 基于电子结构理论的量子模拟方法被认为不适用于格林·久保形式主义中的原子传热，因为量子力学能量密度和电流在原子尺度上固有地不确定。 我们表明，尽管这种困难也会影响经典的模拟，但由于能量的扩展和守恒，热导率确实对这种不确定性不敏感。 基于这些发现，我们从密度泛函理论推导了绝热能量通量的表达式，该表达式允许使用从头算平衡分子动力学来模拟传热。 通过将其预测与经典的平衡和从头开始的非平衡（M＆ller＆＃8211; Plathe）模拟对液-氩模型进行比较，并将其应用于环境条件下的重水，证明了我们的方法。 / p>

title: Long-range p–d exchange interaction in a ferromagnet–semiconductor hybrid structure
title_cn: 铁磁体-半导体混合结构中的远距离p-d交换相互作用
abstract: Hybrid structures synthesized from different materials have attracted considerable attention because they may allow not only combination of the functionalities of the individual constituents but also mutual control of their properties. To obtain such a control an interaction between the components needs to be established. For coupling the magnetic properties, an exchange interaction has to be implemented which typically depends on wavefunction overlap and is therefore short-ranged, so that it may be compromised across the hybrid interface. Here we study a hybrid structure consisting of a ferromagnetic Co layer and a semiconducting CdTe quantum well, separated by a thin (Cd, Mg)Te barrier. In contrast to the expected p–d exchange that decreases exponentially with the wavefunction overlap of quantum well holes and magnetic atoms, we find a long-ranged, robust coupling that does not vary with barrier width up to more than 30 nm. We suggest that the resulting spin polarization of acceptor-bound holes is induced by an effective p–d exchange that is mediated by elliptically polarized phonons.
abstract_cn: 由不同材料合成的混合结构引起了相当大的关注，因为它们不仅可以结合各个组成部分的功能，而且可以相互控制其性能。为了获得这种控制，需要在组件之间建立交互。为了耦合磁性能，必须实现交换相互作用，该相互作用通常取决于波函数重叠并且因此是短距离的，从而在整个混合界面上可能受到损害。在这里，我们研究了由铁磁Co层和半导体CdTe量子阱组成的混合结构，该结构被薄（Cd，Mg）Te势垒隔开。与预期的p＆d交换随量子阱孔和磁性原子的波函数重叠而呈指数下降的相反，我们发现了一种长距离的，鲁棒的耦合，该耦合不会随着势垒宽度的增加而变化，直至超过30＆＃8201;。纳米我们认为，受体结合的空穴的自旋极化是由椭圆极化的声子介导的有效p＆d交换引起的。</ p>

title: Characterization of collective ground states in single-layer NbSe2
title_cn: 单层NbSe2中集体基态的表征
abstract: Layered transition metal dichalcogenides are ideal systems for exploring the effects of dimensionality on correlated electronic phases such as charge density wave (CDW) order and superconductivity. In bulk NbSe2 a CDW sets in at TCDW = 33 K and superconductivity sets in at Tc = 7.2 K. Below Tc these electronic states coexist but their microscopic formation mechanisms remain controversial. Here we present an electronic characterization study of a single two-dimensional (2D) layer of NbSe2 by means of low-temperature scanning tunnelling microscopy/spectroscopy (STM/STS), angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (ARPES), and electrical transport measurements. We demonstrate that 3 × 3 CDW order in NbSe2 remains intact in two dimensions. Superconductivity also still remains in the 2D limit, but its onset temperature is depressed to 1.9 K. Our STS measurements at 5 K reveal a CDW gap of Δ = 4 meV at the Fermi energy, which is accessible by means of STS owing to the removal of bands crossing the Fermi level for a single layer. Our observations are consistent with the simplified (compared to bulk) electronic structure of single-layer NbSe2, thus providing insight into CDW formation and superconductivity in this model strongly correlated system.
abstract_cn: 层状过渡金属二卤化物是探索尺寸对相关电子相（例如电荷密度波（CDW）级和超导性）的影响的理想系统。在块状NbSe 2 中，CDW设置在T CDW = 33＆＃8201; K，超导设置在T c = 7.2＆＃8201 ; K。在T c 以下，这些电子态共存，但它们的微观形成机制仍存在争议。在这里，我们通过低温扫描隧道显微镜/光谱学（STM / STS），角度分辨光发射光谱学（NbSe 2 ）对二维（2D）NbSe 2 层进行电子表征ARPES）和电传输测量。我们证明3＆＃215; NbSe 2 中的3个CDW顺序在二维上保持不变。超导也仍然保持在2D极限内，但是其起始温度被降低到1.9K。我们在5K的STS测量结果显示CDW差距为＆＃916;。费米能量等于4meV，由于去除了穿过单层费米能级的能带，因此可以通过STS进行访问。我们的观察结果与单层NbSe 2 的简化（相比于体）电子结构一致，从而提供了对该模型强相关系统中CDW的形成和超导性的了解。

title: Transmission of torque at the nanoscale
abstract: In macroscopic mechanical devices, torque is transmitted through gearwheels and clutches. In the construction of devices at the nanoscale, torque and its transmission through soft materials will be a key component. However, this regime is dominated by thermal fluctuations leading to dissipation. Here we demonstrate the principle of torque transmission for a disc-like colloidal assembly exhibiting clutch-like behaviour, driven by 27 particles in optical traps. These are translated on a circular path to form a rotating boundary that transmits torque to additional particles confined to the interior. We investigate this transmission and find that it is determined by solid-like or fluid-like behaviour of the device and a stick–slip mechanism reminiscent of macroscopic gearwheels slipping. The transmission behaviour is predominantly governed by the rotation rate of the boundary and the density of the confined system. We determine the efficiency of our device and thus optimize conditions to maximize power output.
abstract_cn: 在宏观机械设备中，扭矩通过齿轮和离合器传递。在纳米级设备的构造中，扭矩及其通过软质材料的传递将是关键组成部分。但是，这种情况主要由导致耗散的热波动决定。在这里，我们展示了碟形胶体组件的扭矩传递原理，该组件表现出类似离合器的行为，由光阱中的27个粒子驱动。它们在圆形路径上平移以形成旋转边界，该边界将扭矩传递到限制在内部的其他粒子。我们研究了这种传输方式，发现它是由设备的固体或类似流体的行为以及粘滞滑移机制决定的，该机制让人联想到宏观齿轮打滑。传输行为主要由边界的旋转速率和受限系统的密度决定。我们确定设备的效率，从而优化条件以最大化功率输出。
